articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Rutu bhai is…’: Jaiswal opens up on Gaikwad's unfortunate run out - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Yashasvi Jaiswal gave Ruturaj Gaikwad a special mention after playing the match-winning knock for India in the 2nd T20I against Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Youngster Yashasvi Jaiswal played a blistering knock against Australia to extend India's winning run over the visitors in the ongoing five-match bilateral T20I series on Sunday. Half-centuries from o… [+2513 chars]
